content.p: The School of Biosciences Research Bulletin is a quarterly digest of research news, events and publications from the School of Biosciences at the Malaysia campus. It highlights our ground-breaking research endeavours including grants and prizes, conferences, publications and events. The bulletin is currently managed by the School of Biosciences Research Committee. Please direct enquiries to Chin Chiew Foan (email: chiew-foan.chin@nottingham.edu.my). For more news from the School, please see our news and events pages, subscribe to our Bioscience blog, follow us on Twitter or ‘like’ us on Facebook.
